title: Call of Duty: Black Ops + All DLCs + Zombies + Multiplayer
body:
Call of Duty: Black Ops + All DLCs + Zombies + Multiplayer


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Companies: Treyarch / Activision
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI6
Original Size: 22.1 GB
Repack Size: 7~7.3 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent / Kickass Torrents [magnet] [.torrent file only] MULTI6
  • RuTor [magnet] ENG/RUS
  • FreeTorrents ENG/RUS
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] ENG/RUS
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) MULTI6
  • Filehoster: FileCorn (Uploaded by Sabco, compatible with MultiUpload mirrors) MULTI6

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Call.of.Duty.Black.Ops.MULTi6-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-call.of.duty.black.ops.iso (22,163,226,624 bytes)
  • Missing Rezurrection Content Pack files (1.5 GB) added, courtesy of Christsnatcher
  • BGamerT5 alternative crack available in NoDVD folder after installation, allowing Zombies, Multiplayer with bots and Multiplayer with friends support
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature – you can skip downloading and installing of languages you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 22.1 to 7~7.3 GB for any single language)
  • Installation takes 30-60 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 12 GB
  • Repack uses pZlib library by Razor12911

Game Description

The biggest first-person action series of all time and the follow-up to last year’s blockbuster Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare 2 returns with Call of Duty®: Black Ops.
Call of Duty®: Black Ops will take you behind enemy lines as a member of an elite special forces unit engaging in covert warfare, classified operations, and explosive conflicts across the globe. With access to exclusive weaponry and equipment, your actions will tip the balance during the most dangerous time period mankind has ever known.

Game Features

  • Cinematic Single Player Campaign: An epic campaign and story that takes you to a variety of locations and conflicts all over the world where you will play as an elite Black Ops soldier in deniable operations where if you are caught, captured or killed, your country will disavow all knowledge of your existence.
  • Signature Multiplayer: Call of Duty’s signature multiplayer gameplay returns with new perks and killstreaks, deeper levels of character and weapon customization, and all new modes including:
  • Wager Matches: One in the Chamber, Gun Game, Sticks and Stones, Sharpshooter
  • Theater Mode: View, record, and edit your favorite moments from multiplayer, and share with your friends
  • Combat Training: Test your skill solo or Co-Op with friends against AI enemy players
  • Zombies!: Fan favorite Zombie mode is back providing endless hours of Zombie-slaying entertainment, solo or Co-Op

Included DLCs

  • Annihilation Content Pack
  • Escalation Content Pack
  • First Strike Content Pack
  • Rezurrection Content Pack

You can skip downloading of language files you don’t need. Here is the list of selective files:

  • setup-fitgirl-selective-english.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-french.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-german.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-italian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-russian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with Spanish UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download [b]setup-fitgirl-selective-spanish.bin[/b] & all main files (01-09).

To activate ZM/MP capabilities, copy all files from “NoDVD\BGamerT5” to game root, overwriting files.

Then run “bgT5Launcher.exe” and click “Start Hostmode” button.

  • For Zombies click singleplayer, then in game select Zombie, Singleplayer and play
  • For Multiplayer with bots, click Multiplayer, then in game select Combat Training, set maps/params and play with bots
  • For Multiplayer with friends/new version of BGamer, check this official page: https://bgiw.jimdo.com/projects/call-of-duty/black-ops/
